overview: Meghna a housewife is watching Rahul exercise from her balcony then goes to his house persuading him to sleep with her. But Rahul refuses to do so but eventually has no choice as Meghna blackmails him. After some time Rahul’s girlfriend arrives who is meeting him for the first time as they met through social media. She tries to make love to Rahul but disoriented with the previous event Rahul is unable to do so.
title: Fraud Ishq
